column4: Hi guys, I just bought a laptop and want to install Ubuntu. The laptop has Intel 4500HD. When I try to boot in Live CD to install ubuntu, I drop at shell. How can I install Ubuntu?!
you could try the alterantive installer cd.
anyway to use the normal CD?
it could be your cd is bad also.
no idea - ive not had any issues with installers in ages
64bit flash is in beta testing by adobe i belive. Theres people in here that have used it with few issues.. some have had more issues..
will Flash in 32 still sucks in Linux!
ive had very few issues with flash on this machine. Using 32bit flash on a 64bit install
try some other apps like vlc to access the webcam
most video players can access a 'video for linux' compatiable device
so its a cheese issue. and not a cam/driver issue
but I doesn't work with Skype also
so its a cheese and skype issue. and not a cam/driver issue
